name: fin-microservices
description: Microservices architecture for Fin financial app

scripts.install-all: npm run install-bff && npm run install-user-service && npm run install-transaction-service
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-bff" "npm run dev-user-service" "npm run dev-transaction-service"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start-bff" "npm run start-user-service" "npm run start-transaction-service"
